title: Player Creation Help, Getting in Contact With a(the) Member(s) of the Riot Community Team
body:
Hello! i have seen many people have been trying to get Maraudaur to look at their champion designs and im here to help with that
but with general members of the community team! See most of the community team which browse boards are on facebook believe it or not! i have had many conversations with Maraudaur and given many suggestions on things to do with the game! We have had many well thought out and debates about things to do with the game! well anyway back to the point of the post You can get in contact with the community team which browse the boards via facebook, altho Maraudaur is the most responsive well here are the Links

Maraudaur- https://www.facebook.com/Maraudaur/

LittleMissCheeky- https://www.facebook.com/RiotLittlemisscheeky

Stupendous- https://www.facebook.com/riotstupendous

I Hope this helped all you Champion Concept creators, Video creators etc etc etc.
Thankyou for paying attention to me!!!

replies.body: i would love it if i got feed back ;(
These are all the members of the riot community team i currently know that have facebook!!! sorry i couldnt be more helpful :(
